location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Peter Elwin Wrench, Dymoke Lyster, and George Skipp, East India Company Agent and Council at Bussora [Basra], to William Bowyear, East India Company Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter gives approval for a purchase of Carmenia wool and acknowledges the report that Carem Caun [Karim Khan] has presented the Chaub [Banu Kaâ€˜b] with gifts. It is suspected that the Ottoman authorities may have intercepted a letter to the Agency at Basra.
